mapper.sql: SELECT MENU_TYPE as menuType , AUTH_GRP_CD as authGrpCd , AUTH_GRP_NM as authGrpNm , USE_YN as useYn , AUTH_GRP_DESC as authGrpDesc , AUTH_GRP_ODR as authGrpOdr , REG_NO as regNo , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regNm , REG_DTTM as regDttm , MOD_NO as modNo , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(MOD_NO) FROM DUAL) AS modNm , MOD_DTTM as modDttm FROM tb_sys_auth_grp WHERE MENU_TYPE = #{menuType}
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 해당 사용자가 부여 받은 권한 목록 */
AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND AUTH_GRP_CD IN (SELECT AUTH_GRP_CD FROM tb_usr_user_auth_grp WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ) ORDER BY AUTH_GRP_ODR

/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 해당 사용자가 부여 받지 않은 권한 목록 */
AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND AUTH_GRP_CD NOT IN (SELECT AUTH_GRP_CD FROM tb_usr_user_auth_grp WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ) ORDER BY AUTH_GRP_ODR
